eShares (https://esharesinc.com/) – Mountain View, California – FULLTIME

We're looking for FULL STACK engineers to help us bring private corporation ownership tracking into the modern era. We're replacing the dead-tree versions of stock certificates and option grants with fully electronic versions.

Many of the other companies listed here are clients of eShares and we're getting a lot of exciting traction. You may have seen a blog post about a month ago about broken Cap Tables here on HN [0][1] - that's us!

We're growing rapidly, in terms of customers, revenue, and employees. We recently raised our Series A investment through Union Square Ventures and Spark Capital.

- Python / Django

- Javascript

- AWS / dev-ops

- SQL (PostgreSQL)

Financial background not required!

Contact/Questions?: eric+hn@esharesinc.com
